page.title: 19J.A.M.CLUB
page.content: Every Thursday we go to J.A.M. club. One of our teachers at school,Mr. Taylor,helps to run the club. J.A.M. stands for"Jesus and me". When we arrive we get our membership card which has our name,address and telephone number on so that we can be contacted if for any reason the meeting for that week has to be cancelled. We learn about Jesus and the Disciples from the Bible and how he affects our life today.We sing songs,pray,play games and have stories about Jesus.We also have a quiz and can earn points for correct answers.At the end of term we can change our points for prizes and stickers.We have a prayer drill which Mr.Taylor does with us. We have been going to J.A.M. club for a few years now and we really enjoy it.
